p: The systematic errors (RMSE) of temperature ranged from 2.82 to 3.5 °C, which is superior to the error found in the South of China by Yang et al. (2013), and in Germany by Jänicke et al. (2015) Lee et al. (2016). It may be attributed to the high values measured and not observed in other studies. Acero and Arrizabalaga (2016) found similar results for high values. Additionally, the simulation has to start in the beginning of the day, due to the neutral atmosphere, avoiding errors in radiation pattern.
